title: 如何创建一个自定义颜色的药水物品堆
author: BlueHalo
txt_content:
代码:

PotionMeta pmt = null;

pmt.setColor(Color.fromRGB(102, 204, 255));

dolphin_drink_item.setItemMeta(pmt);

dolphin_drink_item.addEnchantment(Enchantment.WATER_WORKER, 2);

SlimefunItem dolphin_drink = new SlimefunItem(DolphinDream, dolphin_drink_item, "DOLPHIN_DRINK", RecipeType.JUICER, new ItemStack[] {SlimefunItem.getItem("DOLPHIN_SHARD")});
